remarks: Orthocomplement of a closed subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jul-2014.)
statement:
dochvalr2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dochvalr2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
dochvalr2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochvalr2.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochvalr2.n $e |- N = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochvalr2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( N ` ( I ` X ) ) = ( I ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) $.
